transcript:
Customer: Hello?
H Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ektaar Services se baat kar rahi hai Akhil Ahmed ji se?
Customer: Haan ji sir boliye, good morning.
Executive: Good morning sir. Sir aapse kal baat hui thi na meri, main actually business manager baat kar raha hu Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan Vivek ji boliye, kal to actually aapse baat hui thi meri.
Executive: Haan haan sir actually I am sorry maine aapko shayad 11 baje ka time diya tha sir. Main actually ek meeting mein tha to main connect nahi kar paya, main jaise hi free hua hu maine connect kiya hai aapse.
Customer: Koi baat nahi sir, haan boliye.
Executive: Ye ek number hai sir jisme end mein 525 hai, ye bhi aap hi ka hai na?
Customer: 525?
Executive: Five.
Customer: Haan 525.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan yahi hai, mera staff ke paas rahta hai ye.
Executive: Achha achha samajh gaya. To main wahi dekh raha tha sir ki aapne aapka na ek aur account hai sir jo shayad kisi other number se registered hai aur aap na shayad us number pe ya us account se na aap koshish kar rahe the IndiaMART ko reach out karne ka. Isi karan wo shayad pata nahi laga kyuki aapka concern ye tha ki aap kafi time se koshish kar rahe hain but kisi ne connect nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na? To isliye maine socha ek bar main directly aapse connect karu. I hope sir ye sahi time hai aapse baat karne ka.
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Hmm. To abhi sir aap hi use karte hain services ya staffs sirf karta hai?
Customer: Staffs hain, main to nahi karta. Staffs hi baat karte hain, hmm.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Okay okay.
Executive: To main dekh raha tha sir ki waise jo bhi aapke paas direct calls aati hain usme comparatively improvement tha lekin last month jo hai thoda sa wo drop hua hai.
Customer: Thoda sa nahi sir bahut drop hua hai, concern hai buyer supplier conflict hai.
Executive: Achha achha. Uski wajah se hua uske regarding maine bahut koshish ki ki legal team se baat karke isko resolve kare kyuki buyers hai na to maine buyers ko apne tarike se apne end se samjhane ki koshish kiya but buyers ne product use kar chuka hai, use karne ke one month baad kah raha hai ki mujhe paise wapas karo.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo bhi other company se bhi wo product kharida hai but wo bol raha hai ki nahi mujhe sara company ka paisa aap hi wapas karo mujhe jabki hamare company se sirf teen invoice gayi hui hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Jo ₹26,078 ka hai. To main unse bola ki sir dekh lo aapas mein baat karke agar kuch chemicals lagta hai dobara se to main kuch discount mein karke kahin na kahin aapko jo hai asuvidha nahi hone dunga. Complaint karke kya fayda hai to kul mila jula ke main apne end se bahut samjhaya unko but wo manne ko tayar nahi hai bol rahe nahi main nahi janta mujhe pura paisa wapas chahiye. To main chahta hu ki mere product agar wapas mil jate to paisa easily de dete usme koi dikkat nahi thi lekin product use ho gaya hai aur phir main paise du to mera loss ho raha hai aur ye concern kafi long time se hai 20-25 din se upar ho gaya.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Isliye hamare company ka business kafi disturb hai. Mujhe bhi thoda effect pad raha hai. To isiliye main jo hai staff ko bhi bola ki aap log connect kariye. Aap log se agar baat hoti hai to mera baat karaiyega to main baat karunga.
Executive: Achha. Waise to sir hamari jo buyer supplier conflict ki team hai wo alag se already I think ispe kaam kar rahi hai.
Customer: Kafi din ho gaya na sir agar do char din hota to main sochta. Haan 13 October se chal raha hai I think ye.
Customer: Haan to main nahi chahta ki long chale isko main chahta hu sir sach mein kuch agar ho jaye resolution to achha rahega. Service gadbad ho rahi hai na hamari. Leads nahi aa rahe hain, calls nahi aa rahe hain, listing mein down ja rahi hai company. Humne TrustSeal ka paisa de rakha hai, paid member ho aur kafi dino se achha kaam kar raha hu. Isme help chahiye IndiaMART ki taraf se.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir. To isme main dekh raha hu sir ki I think hamara na pahle bhi kuch conflict hua hai kuch kuch buyers ke sath.
Customer: Hua hai sir teen char hua tha main usko kuch conflict main khud se resolve kiya hu IndiaMART ki jarurat nahi padi hai. To buyers se wo bhi baat tha jo samajh sakte the to unko samjha ke main band karaya hai kuch return ka baat tha to product maine return mangaya aur paise wapas kar diye to wo main khud hi maximum jo hai sare chizo ko close karaya hai but ye ek aisa concern hai ki hamare samaksh se bahar hai product bhi nahi de rahe paise wapas mang rahe hain to hum is chiz mein samajh nahi pa rahe hain ki hum kaise solution kare.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Achha aur main dekh raha hu sir ki isme I think buyer ko aapne ₹1000 I think buyer ne pay kiya tha aur ₹13000 aapne COD ke liye diya tha.
Customer: Haan advance courier charge jo hai buyer diye hain humne baki COD gaya tha.
Executive: ₹1000.
Customer: Haan ₹1000 aur ₹13000 ka COD tha.
Executive: Haan ye ye sir aap mail kara dijiye ye ye concern ke bare mein main nahi bol raha hu aapko ye to shayad kal ya parso concern hue hain lekin inke bare mein mujhe jankari nahi hai ki ye hamare customer hai bhi ya nahi agar hame mail aa jaye to main unse connect karke ye resolve kar lunga main ek aur concern hai purana Shiv Shankar ka uske bare mein baat kar raha hu.
Executive: To aapka ek yahi wala concern chal raha hai na ye kya bolte hain ye jo ₹14000 wala hai sir?
Customer: Aur koi ID nahi open likh rahi hai.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello Akhil ji?
Customer: Ji mam.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello ji mam.
Customer: Ji aapke jo employees hai meri unse baat ho gayi hai maine unko Shiv Shankar ka number diya hai jinki complaint aa rakhi hai hamare paas.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aapko bhi number du ya unko number de diya hai waise maine?
Customer: Shiv Shankar ji ka number hai hamare paas mein.
Customer: Haan to complaint resolve karaiye wo bar bar phone kar rahe hain hamare paas.
Customer: Wo resolve kaise hoga wo product nahi denge to kaise paisa wapas kare ye baat aap kyu nahi samajh rahe?
Customer: To ye aap likh ke de dijiye Sahil ko maine aapko Sahil ka email ID likha tha.
Customer: Sahil ko aap likh ke de dijiye.
Customer: Mail kar diya tha mam lekin koi reply nahi aaya hai Sahil ji ke side se main mail kar hi kar diya tha.
Customer: Kal mail kiya tha aapne Sahil ji ko iske regarding?
Customer: To ab ye kah rahe hain ki unhone chemical wo ₹1.5 lakh ka chemical use kar liya unhone?
Customer: Sorry mam hamare company se sirf teen invoice hui hai wo dusre dusre company se product purchase kiya hai sara complaint hamare company ko kar diya hai aisa thodi hota hai.
Customer: Nahi sir aisa ho hi nahi sakta sir hum log bhi validate karte hain ki haan unki complaint genuinely hai ya nahi hai.
Customer: Apni company ka paisa ka nahi lagata hai madam main to apni company se jitna product sale hoga jitna invoice honge uska main apna baat karunga dusre dusre company ka main paisa bharu?
Customer: Sahil ji ka koi reply nahi aaya.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir aap baat maine number de diya hai Shiv Shankar ji ka baki main ek bar baat kar leti hu.
Customer: Aap aap product to batao.
Customer: Aap baat kariye aur baat karke hame bataiye kya baat hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing buyer supplier conflict issue.

- Wants resolution for conflict with buyer.

- Drop in leads, calls, and listing.

- Wants help from IndiaMART.

- Buyer used product, now wants refund.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to look into the matter.

- Executive shared Shiv Shankar's number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with Shiv Shankar.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, trustseal, conflict, resolution
